title: Was put back into queue for "someone dodging" and it looks like it was me?  Possible bug?
body:
Just now I was in champ select during the ban phase of the game I am having a conversation with my team and everything seems fine.  I get a message saying it is trying to connect me to the server.  When I get connected a short moment later I am back in queue waiting for a game because someone dodged.  After like 3 minutes waiting for a game I realize I cannot even exit the queue so I quit league and open it back up and when I try to start a new game I have a leave buster for 2 and a half minutes. ??????

I know I cannot get LP back and stuff but reporting in case this is part of a larger bug thing.

Thanks

replies.body:
That really sucks that you got hit with a low priority queue for a simple disconnect. {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 

Let's see if we can fix the underlying issue to try and stop that from happening again! This sounds like for some reason you network is having a hard time talking to the game server you were placed into. Go through our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can spruce up that link between your network and the servers.

Thanks the the reply!

Yeah I have been through the troubleshooting.  I just bringing i up because I have never seen that behavior of being re queued after a disconnect in the past few years I have been playing so didn't know if it was an issue with the new client.  Sorry should have mentioned I am on new client.  

Anyways seems like it was a momentary thing on my end.

Thanks again
